attributes.action: allow a morning and afternoon Siesta for workers doing 10 or more hours a day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To allow people working long hours to have a power nap in the morning and the afternoon so that productivity is increased. This would mean office workers would not have to sleep with one eye open for fear of being chastised by their superiors for sleeping on the job.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
